resources.string:
LifeWatch is fall detection application designed with the elderly in mind.

Emergency Messages are sent automatically to select contacts once a fall is detected or the Emergency Button is activated.

Emergency Contacts can be created, edited, and deleted through the Contacts button.

Medication Reminders can be created, edited, and deleted through the Medication button.

Various settings can be edited through the Settings button.

As of release version, SmartWatch should be on left wrist and SmartPhone should be in right pant pocket.
